|buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Marvell MACCHIATOBin - Rev 1.3
By SolidRun Ltd. (www.solidrun.com)'' is silkscreened on the board top. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F8040 @2GHz :Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A72 *Memory: 16GB DDR4 (DIMM) RAM *Storage: 4MB NOR Flash, :8GB Samsung eMMC, 3x SATA 3.0 :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 2x 10GbE via copper or SFP, :1x 2.5GbE SFP, 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 2x USB 2.0 header *PCI: PCI x4 3.0 slot *Power: 12V, 2.5A via barrel or ATX power supply ==Links of Interest== [https://www.arm.com/architecture/systems/systemready-certification-program/es Arm SystemReady ES] Certified *[https://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-networking-mini-itx-has-10-2-5-and-1gbps-ports/ ''Open-spec networking Mini-ITX has 1, 2.5, and 10 GbE ports'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/04/24/solidrun-macchiatobin-mini-itx-networking-board-is-now-available-for-349-and-up/ ''SolidRun MACCHIATOBin Mini-ITX Networking Board'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/marvell/marvell_macchiatobin_double_shot |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/marvell/marvell_macchiatobin |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mvebu |subtarget = cortexa72 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a72 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
